name: D.O.L.P.H.I.N
description:
D.O.L.P.H.I.N was made for Curdle Jam #27.

Controls:
  • WASD to move
  • Space to Jump

Tip: you can jump over short platforms but not the taller ones. You could tell if you can jump over a platform by checking if there's a box on top; if there is then you can't jump over it.

This is my first submission to a game jam!

Main menu music made by: syncopika (not a team member)
